statement:
mapdindp1.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
mapdindp1.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` W ) $.
mapdindp1.o $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
mapdindp1.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
mapdindp1.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
mapdindp1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.W $e |- ( ph -> w e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.e $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) = ( N ` { Z } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.ne $e |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { Y } ) ) $.
mapdindp1.f $e |- ( ph -> -. w e. ( N ` { X , Y } ) ) $.
mapdindp3 $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` { X } ) =/= ( N ` { ( w .+ Y ) } ) ) $.
